name: EscapeOrDie
description:
Steemit: https://steemit.com/@level-architect

Story of a woman woke up stuck within the dark basement. Trapped, she tries to find a way out unknowingly of the danger ahead. Using the environment around her; she has many options to escape before the killer catches her.

"EscapeOrDie" Controls:

  • WASD game using the keys to move the player.
  • (esc) Pause Menu
  • press (I) to open Inventory
  • Trying to find ways to escape, click "space bar" to interact with items.
  • Use the items to open doors and obstacles.
